title: From politics to ethics: Transformations in EU policies on digital technology
research_description: This paper examines the shifts in European Union policies on digital technology, with a focus on how these policies balance democratic input, throughput, and output principles, particularly in relation to the governance of AI.
research_results: The study highlights a gradual shift from public politics to ethics, emphasizing private sector responsibility in AI development and the increasing role of the tech industry in EU policymaking.
future_research: Future research could explore the balance between public and private sector influence in AI governance and the long-term implications for democracy in the digital age.
